meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nick Hurwitz Ruth Payne Scott McFadden Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7795.

td.p: Nick Hurwitz, a writer from Los Angeles, California
Ruth Payne, a law school career counselor from Charlottesville, Virginia
Scott McFadden, a librarian from Muncie, Indiana (whose 2-day cash winnings total $59,602)

tr.td: BIRTH OF A SALESMAN
OLYMPIC HOST CITIES
MULTIPLE A's
HISTORIC LOSERS
TV SHOW ENCYCLOPEDIAS & COMPANIONS
ON THE PLAYGROUND

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Born Oct. 5, 1902, Ray Kroc sold paper cups & blenders before making it big with this fast food chain')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Born Oct. 5, 1902, Ray Kroc sold paper cups & blenders before making it big with this fast food chain
